0101110011001101 1100001010010000 1 -> sum: 0001111101011110, cout: 1

1001101100100101 0110011001101101 0 -> sum: 0000000110010010, cout: 1
0010110100010010 0000001010000001 1 -> sum: 0010111110010100, cout: 0
